description: This file defines the main Backbone.js view for a TodoMVC application, managing UI interactions, rendering, and event handling for the todo list.

classes.name: app.AppView
classes.description: Main Backbone view managing the TodoMVC application's user interface and interactions.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Sets up event bindings, initializes DOM element references, and fetches existing todos.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Updates the UI to reflect the current state of the todo list, including statistics and filter selection.

methods.name: addOne
methods.description: Creates and appends a view for a single todo item.

methods.name: addAll
methods.description: Adds all todo items to the list view.

methods.name: filterOne
methods.description: Triggers visibility update for a single todo item.

methods.name: filterAll
methods.description: Applies filtering to all todo items.

methods.name: newAttributes
methods.description: Generates attributes for a new todo item based on input.

methods.name: createOnEnter
methods.description: Creates a new todo item when Enter key is pressed in input.

methods.name: toggleAllComplete
methods.description: Marks all todos as completed or not based on the toggle checkbox.
